feed.title: GitHub HLSL Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of HLSL in GitHub

entry.title: jiaozi158/ShellFurURP
entry.summary: Geometry/Multi-Pass Shell-based Fur shader for Unity's URP (Universal Render Pipeline). Based on hecomi's UnityFurURP Repository.

entry.title: jackie2009/blockWeightTerrainRender
entry.summary: 一种性能与效果更平衡的地形混合算法.开销比farcry5方案多15% 但效果都比farcry5方案更好些,支持沙漠等大区域半透明混合
